item.title: About
item.description: Let’s not buy into the system

item.title: Zero-Sum Game
item.description: I’m just tired of doing MEV. It used to be fun, but not anymore. MEV is a zero-sum game, or perhaps a negative-sum game. After I realized that, I stopped talking about MEV on SNS. Sorry, but this is how it works and I hate to do it. Now, I don’t care about MEV anymore. MEV in 2020 MEV in 2023 When someone is making, someone is losing Here is an example where someone lost a lot of money(not sure how much) and a MEV bot made $939 in a single tx.
